title: Global virus deaths pass 150,000 as Trump endorses lockdown protests
description: Governments around the world are now grappling with when and how to ease lockdowns that have crippled the global economy, even as the COVID-19 death toll climbs further in hard-hit countries. Demonstrators in three US states assembled in public this week to c…
content:
WASHINGTON: Coronavirus deaths have surged past 150,000 worldwide with nearly a quarter of them in the United States, where President Donald Trump lent his support to protestors rallying against lockdown orders.
Evidence is mounting that social distancing su… [+3997 chars]
